name: PepperRomi The FreeSample
description:
Slight Volume Warning in some areas [?]

Made in Construct 3 [ and it's quite a short game due to a limited amount of event spaces and deadlines]

 This game is  Made in around 2 weeks for a collage project, inspired by games such as Wario Land 4, Pizza Tower And Celeste.  More work will be done on this series if a good amount of people find this project interesting :D

  this also is my first time making a game, hope you enjoy it! 

feel free to leave Feedback and Constructive criticism in the comments, Thank You!

plan to make more content in the future

 (special thanks to EnyaPanda For voicing PepperRomi) 

All music used is Copyright free and can be found on youtube
